notes: Grind the first three ingredients into a fine powder, then add the other two and continue grinding until a paste is formed. A few drops of sesame oil may be added if it is too dry. Store in an amber air tight jar. After washing the area with soap, apply with a sterile cotton ball and rub gently. Apply once daily.
